snippet.title: ARK: Genesis Announcement Trailer
snippet.description:
Continue your quest for survival and unlock a whole new chapter in the saga of ARK: Survival Evolved with the ARK: Genesis Season Pass! This Season Pass gives you access to two new huge expansion packs and one exclusive in-game cosmetic pet. Further the ARK storyline while adventuring through unique and diverse biomes via an all new mission-based game mechanic. Discover, utilize and master new creatures, new craftable items and new craftable structures unlike anything you have seen yet!

Visit https://playark.com/genesis/ today to pick up your Gensis Season Pass!

The All New Genesis Season Pass includes:
- ARK: Genesis Part 1 (available December 2019) 
- ARK: Genesis Part 2 (available winter 2020) 
- Exclusive HLN-A cosmetic pet (available now), only obtainable by purchasing the ARK: Genesis Season Pass!

For the latest updates follow us on:

Twitter at https://www.twitter.com/survivetheark
Like us on Facebook https://www.facebook.com/survivetheark/
Visit the Website: http://playark.com 
Community Hub: http://www.survivetheark.com
Subreddit: https://www.reddit.com/r/playark
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/survivetheark
Plus watch us tame and train leviathan creatures: https://www.twitch.tv/survivetheark
